definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin

sentences.english: The vehicle, painted white with a red crescent, was parked at the clinic entrance, where Osama was busily cleaning it.
sentences.chinese: 車漆成白色，噴上紅新月標識，停在醫院門口。

sentences.english: Vang said the Crescent City event began in 1998.
sentences.chinese: 萬榮說，紅新月會城市的活動始於1998年。

sentences.english: The local representative of the Red Crescent described the position as "a humanitarian crisis".
sentences.chinese: 紅新月會的當地代表形容爲“人道主義危機”的立場。

sentences.english: I had a meeting with a Red Cross & Red Crescent Federation consultant.
sentences.chinese: 我與一個紅十字&紅新月會的顧問見過面。

sentences.english: Today, only the red cross and red crescent are in use.
sentences.chinese: 現在，只有紅十字和紅新月的標誌還在使用中。
